text: This option allows you to specify and animate the rest positions that are used by the simulation inside the SOP network (without having to use a SOP solver). The option defines whether the rest positions should be imported from a SOP geometry node at each frame. When enabled, the solver will copy rest positions from the point attribute
of the SOP geometry node onto the attribute
on the simulation geometry at each frame. If no
exists, then the 'P' attribute from the SOP geometry node is copied instead.
The path to the SOP node that will serve as the source of the rest positions.
